original_text: The more priests that there are among you, the more sins they do against me. They should have received honour as priests, but I will make them ashamed.
korean_text: 그들은 번성할수록 내게 범죄하니 내가 그들의 영화를 변하여 욕이 되게 하리라

sentences.original_text: The more priests that there are among you
the more sins they do against me
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 나를 향해 더 많은 죄를 짓느니라

sentences.original_text: They should have received honour as priests
but I will make them ashamed
